title: When the FUCK are they gonna fix this client?!
body: I swear to god I'm so fucking over it.

replies.body: Ikr every time there is a update i get pissed and get my coffee ready for how many files need to be scanned at 33% and the 0 kbps thing once it reaches 99%.
I get into a game and my screen goes black and I'm forced to dodge ranked queue :'(
